review: For my uses it's ok. Thankfully it will connect to my travel router when the travel router doesn't get blocked at the hotel. Otherwise, the stick will see the hotel wifi and connects but then says there is a connection problem and won't bring up the hotel webpage so i can log in with it. I don't need it at home. I bought it to use when I travel. Some of the hotels I stay in for work have only analog signals for 'fancy' large screen tv. Not pleasant to watch all that static. When it works, it's nice. If I could get it to login to the hotel wifi it would easily be a 4 star device for me.Would I buy a second one? Right now no.
